name: Fae
description: A great magic fairy. It will cure your status effects in battle

name: War Horse
description: A mighty steed. It can assist one in battle with offensive skills and boosts to one's dexterity.

name: Horse
description: A trusty steed. It can assist one in battle with offensive skills and boost one's dexterity.

name: Twilight Wisp
description: A wisp of the night, versed in magic of both light and dark.

name: Ebon Scruug
description: An apparition of greed and envy. Available for a limited time only.

name: Cerberus
description: A tamed Cerberus of Balor. It can assist in battle with spells of fire.

name: Banshee
description: The reason one would want a banshee with them is still quite unknown.

name: Bat
description: A tamed bat. It can drain HP from your enemies in battle.

name: Camazotz
description: The revered bat of death. It can drain HP from your opponents while improving your stats.

name: Ghost
description: A spooky ghost. It may put your opponent to sleep.

name: Ortanite Golem
description: A golem forged of Ortanite. It can assist you in battle with Ward and defensive based skills.

name: Fey Yeti
description: A great yeti lost to the curse of Morrigan. Available for a limited time only.

name: Fjalar
description: A rare Fjalar. It can assist one in battle by increasing dexterity and critical hit rate.

name: Lizarr
description: A tamed, yet aggressive lizarr warrior. It will attack your enemies in battle.

name: Imp
description: A tamed imp. Will occasionally boost your attack.

name: Fire Dragon
description: A dragon with the power of the inferno. It can imbue your weapon with fire and cast fire magic.

name: Gargoyle
description: A living gargoyle. It can assist in battle by rarely petrifying your opponent.

name: Fey Dragon
description: A dragon lost to the curse of Morrigan. Available for a limited time only.

name: Cactus
description: A live cactus. It can assist you in battle with barrages of needles.

name: Phoenix
description: The mighty Phoenix, arisen once again. Available for a limited time only.

name: Warg
description: A tamed warg. It will assist in battle with dark strikes.

name: Dire Wolf
description: A tamed dire wolf. It can assist you in battle with attack and dexterity boosting skills.

name: Sluagh
description: A shrouded Sluagh. It utilizes dark magic in battle.

name: Zu
description: A tamed crow. It has a small chance of boosting your speed in battle.

name: Dog
description: A traveler's best friend.

name: Great Yeti
description: The greatest of the Yeti. It is a true master of defense.

name: Dark Slime
description: A slime of the darkest variable. It can blind your opponent and use dark magic.

name: Giant Basilisk
description: A Giant Red Basilisk. It will assist in battle by attacking often.

name: Griffin
description: A mighty griffin. It can assist you in battle by improving your dexterity, while casting dragon magic.

name: Dark Pegasus
description: A beast of great myth. It can assist you in battle with powerful dark strikes and debuffs.

name: Lobster
description: A lobster. It can cause your opponents to bleed while slightly healing you.

name: Anubis
description: The magical might of the Jackal god knows no bounds.

name: Great Cockatrice
description: The mighty cockatrice. It can poison or petrify an opponent, while occasionally boosting your speed in battle.

name: Minotaur
description: A certainly powerful ally.

name: Storm Dragon
description: A dragon with the power of the clouds above. It can imbue your weapon with lightning and cast lightning magic.

name: Wolf
description: A tamed wolf. It will often attack your enemies in battle.

name: Greater Yokai
description: A tricky yokai.  It has a chance of causing an opponent one of many ailments

name: Ice Dragon
description: A dragon with the power of the cold. It can imbue your weapon with ice and cast ice magic.

name: Gheist
description: A spooky gheist. It may put your opponent to sleep.

name: Arcane Slime
description: A tamed slime, capable of arcane magic.

name: Surtr's Mighty Flame
description: Available for limited time only, this massive flame can ensure your opponent is always frozen or lit ablaze.

name: Succubus
description: A grimly singing succubus. It can assist you in battle by improving your dexterity or attack power.

name: Snake
description: A tamed snake. Occasionally, it can poison your opponents in battle.

name: Mimic
description: A mimic. What it is capable of is unknown.

name: Finfolk
description: A fabled finfolk of the sea.

name: Pollux
description: Available for a limited time: the terrible twin Pollux can assist you in battle with a variety of skills.

name: Ashen Phoenix
description: The mighty Phoenix, fallen once again. Available for a limited time only.

name: Harpy
description: A happily singing harpy. It can assist you in battle by improving your dexterity or causing an opponent to be lulled to sleep.

name: Lesser Golem
description: A tamed golem. It will cast protection on you in battle.

name: Yeti
description: The storied yeti. Can boost your defenses in battle while assisting you with ice magic.

name: Odok
description: The decrepit Odok. It will frequently assist you in battle.

name: Bear
description: A wild bear. It will frequently attack your enemies.

name: Nidhogg
description: A horrific serpentine dragon capable of beastly attacks.

name: Fey Chimera
description: A beastly chimera lost to the curse of Morrigan. Available for a limited time only.

name: Gnome
description: A gnome. It can assist you in battle with its spells.

name: Cockatrice
description: The might cockatrice. It can poison or petrify an opponent, while occasionally boosting your speed in battle.

name: Chimera
description: A fierce Chimera. This follower can cause one to go berserk, while assisting in battle with beastly spells.

name: Pumpkinhead
description: A true brute of stories of old. Available for a limited time only.

name: Reaper
description: A stray Reaper of Ankou. It will not attack often, but will wreck havoc when it does.

name: Fenrir
description: The unrelenting Fenrir. It can assist you in battle with strong physical attacks and status effects.

name: Triton
description: A brown crustacean. It can cause your opponents to bleed while slightly healing you.

name: Dark Dragon
description: An ebony dragon. It can assist one in battle with dark magic.

name: Guivre
description: An elusive Great Dragon. It can assist in battle with powerful dragon spells.

name: Mighty Griffin
description: A mighty griffin. It can assist you in battle by improving your critical hit rate, while casting dragon magic.

name: Orthrus
description: The unrelenting Orthrus.

name: Yokai
description: The storied Yokai is a master of sleep and that of nightmares.

name: Basilisk
description: A tamed basilisk. It is well versed at the art of poison.

name: Seer
description: A seer of Ra. It can blind an opponent in battle.

name: Lesser Red Slime
description: A tamed red slime. It is not very powerful, but may assist you in battle with fire magic.

name: Lesser Slime
description: A tamed slime. It is not very powerful, but may assist you in battle.

name: Wyvern
description: A wild wyvern. It can occasionally breathe fire at your opponent, causing blight.

name: Gazer
description: The storied gazer. It utilizes lightning magic in battle.

name: Death Worm
description: The revered Death Worm of the sands. It can harden your defenses while casting Earthen magic.

name: Naggeneen
description: Oh, the foul fairy Naggeneen. Available for limited time.

name: Fey Gazer
description: A gazer lost to the curse of Morrigan. Available for a limited time only.

name: Archimedes
description: Available for a limited time only: a companion of Merlin, this great bird can assist one in battle by increasing magical potential.

name: Cthulhu
description: This dreaded beast of the seas can assist you in battle with status effects and HP absorption.

name: Greater Lobster
description: A green lobster. It can cause your opponents to bleed while slightly healing you.

name: Pale Dragon
description: An ivory dragon of the light skies. It is extremely versed in holy magic.

name: Ancient Jinn
description: A magical Jinn. It can cast fey magic while granting its talents to its master.

name: Hellhound
description: A tamed hellhound. Can assist in battle with attacks and fire magic.

name: Colossus
description: The mighty Colossus. It can boost your defenses, while draining an opponent's HP.

name: Orichalcum Golem
description: A golem forged of Orichalcum. It can assist you in battle with Ward and defensive based skills.

name: Wisp
description: A strange floating ball of energy. It is quite proficient at healing its allies.

name: Mighty Slime
description: A mighty slime warrior. It will attack your foes often.

name: Earthen Dragon
description: A dragon with the power of the earth. It can imbue your weapon with earthen power and cast earthen magic.

name: Turul
description: A rare Turul. It can assist one in battle by diminishing an opponent's stats.

name: Arisen Naggeneen
description: Oh, the foul fairy Naggeneen. Available for limited time.

name: Kerberos
description: Arisen from the deep depths of the Underworld. Available for a limited time only.

name: Draugr Mage
description: A draugr of certain magical ability.

name: Scruug
description: An apparition of greed and envy. Available for a limited time only.

name: Great Jinn
description: A magical Jinn. It can cast unstable magic while turning the tide of the battle.

name: Fairy
description: A magic fairy. It will heal you in battle.

name: Castor
description: Available for a limited time: the terrible twin Castor can assist you in battle with great elemental resistance.

name: Evil Eye
description: A strange floating eye. It seems to know rudimentary magic.

name: Crimson Gazer
description: A reckless Gazer. Be careful bringing this one with you.

name: Big Cactus
description: A giant live cactus. It can assist you in battle with barrages of needles.

name: Crow
description: A tamed crow. It has a small chance of boosting your speed in battle.

name: Great Bear
description: A very mighty bear. It can lend you its might, but at the cost of your defenses.

name: Mighty Mimic
description: The mightiest of mimics. It will cause mischief in battle while casting spells.

name: Surtr's Flame
description: Available for limited time only, this massive flame can ensure your opponent is always lit ablaze.

name: Elder Gnome
description: An experienced gnome who brings unstable magic into battle.

name: Drake
description: A tamed Drake. It will occasionally summon meteor against your enemies.

name: Great Gazer
description: A great gazer. It can lower an opponents stats, while casting offensive magic.

name: Undead Golem
description: A great undead golem. It will assist you in battle by granting and restoring ward.

name: Fafnir
description: The great cursed Fafnir. While curing on of status ailments, it will assist you in battle with dark and dragon magic.

name: Arcane Flame
description: A flame of arcane power. It can assist one in battle with both arcane and dragon magic.

name: Pegasus
description: A beast of great myth. It can assist you in battle with powerful strikes and curative holy magic
